comments.body:
We have `freetype2` in `conda-forge` conda you try to use that instead of the system version?

Also, you may need to add some X11 stuff in the `yum_requirements.txt` I mentioned below.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +10,14 @@    if [ -d "/opt/X11" ]; then
        x11_lib="-L/opt/X11/lib"
        x11_inc="-I/opt/X11/include -I/opt/X11/include/freetype2"
    else
        echo "No X11 libs found. Exiting..." 1>&2
